description:
Both teams manage to take a set each as they start the third set. Since they were able to stop Ushijima, Karasuno tries to stay on that wave. But Shiratorizawa`s setter, Shirabu, seems unfazed by the loss of the second set and they are shown why they`re called undefeated champions. Meanwhile, Ushijima says something to Hinata and...
Source: crunchyroll
